item.title: Axure - Responsive layout - browser width
item.description: I've been playing around with scroll spy and re-creating this effect in Axure.

item.title: Axure - Create Scroll Spy and Sticky Nav Bars like Twitter Bootstrap
item.description: Have you seen Twitter Bootstrap and liked scrollspy javascript? Perhaps you want to use it in Axure to create floating navbars and sticky toolbars?
